description:
With the addition of Eli and Nozomi, μ`s grows to nine members. Because the new group`s open campus concert was a success, the decision to close the school is postponed. Meanwhile, though the group`s School Idol ranking rises to 50th.  Reaching 20th place is necessary to participate in the Love Live and it seems impossible, so Eli decides μ`s must take drastic measures. When the girls go to Akiba as part of their training, they go to a School Idol shop and discover a photograph of Kotori singing while wearing something other than a μ`s uniform...
Source: crunchyroll
